creator: jboynes@apache.org
text:
The JavaDoc for JspConfigDescriptor getTagLibs() and getJspPropertyGroups(0 requires "Any changes to the returned Collection must not affect this JspConfigDescriptor." This also applies to Collections returned from these collections (e.g. preludes).

Tomcat returns a reference to the internal collection and mutations are not isolated.

Fixed in trunk: http://svn.apache.org/r1505199

Not back-porting to 7.0.x due to change in Context interface.
creator: jboynes@apache.org
